Html:
First off...

Thank you Mark! Nice work!

I love everything you have done. I am not sure if you are aware - I didn't see anything on the forums here - but when I click Play after recording - no audio is heard. This only occurs on Vista for me. Did you happen to know or find a solution for this?

I should have clarified - it is for the Coding 4 Fun (v0.1).

The .Net Voice Recorder

http://voicerecorder.codeplex.com/Release/ProjectReleases.aspx?ReleaseId=33787

Note to Self: Human Error > Mark

 

I ended up sending the output to headphones not my speakers.

 

Thanks Mark.

 

Great Job!

glad you got it working in the end ;)

Mark
